org.spongepowered.api.entity

Interface Equipable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Carrier, Identifiable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ArmorEquipable, ArmorStand, Giant, Human, Humanoid, Husk, Player, Skeleton, Stray, User, WhiteSkeleton, WitherSkeleton, Zombie, ZombiePigman, ZombieVillager

    public interface Equipable
extends Identifiable, Carrier
    Represents an entity that has an EquipmentInventory.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      boolean equip(EquipmentType type, ItemStack equipment)
      Sets the item currently equipped by the entity in the specified slot, if the entity has such a slot.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.spongepowered.api.util.Identifiable

        getUniqueId

      • Methods inherited from interface org.spongepowered.api.item.inventory.Carrier

        getInventory

    • Method Detail

      • canEquip

        boolean canEquip(EquipmentType type)
        Gets whether this entity can equip equipment of the specified type (eg. whether calling equip(org.spongepowered.api.item.inventory.equipment.EquipmentType, org.spongepowered.api.item.inventory.ItemStack) will fail because the entity doesn't have this type of slot.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of equipment slot to query
        Returns:
        true if this entity can equip items of the specified type

      • canEquip

        boolean canEquip(EquipmentType type,
                 @Nullable
                 ItemStack equipment)
        Gets whether this entity can equip the supplied equipment in its slot of the specified type (eg. whether calling equip(org.spongepowered.api.item.inventory.equipment.EquipmentType, org.spongepowered.api.item.inventory.ItemStack) with the specified slot type and item will succeed)
        Parameters:
        type - The type of equipment slot to query
        equipment - The equipment to check for
        Returns:
        true if can equip the supplied equipment

      • getEquipped

        Optional<ItemStack> getEquipped(EquipmentType type)
        Gets the item currently equipped by this entity in the specified slot.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of equipment slot to query
        Returns:
        The item in the equipped slot, if available

      • equip

        boolean equip(EquipmentType type,
              @Nullable
              ItemStack equipment)
        Sets the item currently equipped by the entity in the specified slot, if the entity has such a slot.

        Supplying null will unequip any currently equipped item.

        Parameters:
        type - The type of equipment slot to set
        equipment - The equipment to set or null to remove any equipped item
        Returns:
        true if the item was successfully equipped, false if the item could not be equipped because the entity doesn't support the specified equipment type or because the item was incompatible with the specified slot.
